Text:
A high-class casino in the capital. Alexia has been
invited here as a guest of honor.
Hmm... So this is a casino...

(Polished floors, glittering decor, and well-dressed
staff...)

(When I told my father and sister I wanted to come,
they insisted I wasn't ready yet, but the place is
much grander than I expected.)

(I've come all this way, so I'd like to play a game
or two. Maybe the roulette firstâ€”)

What a pleasure seeing you here, Princess Alexia.
It's an honor to make your acquaintance.

Ah! Th-The pleasure is all mine. Thank you for taking
the time to greet me.

Oh, not at all. It's only proper for a humble citizen
like me to greet the princess of the kingdom. Hahahah!
(*sigh* What terrible timing...)

Well, well, if it isn't Princess Alexia! I haven't
seen you since last month's gala.

M-My, it has been a while. Thank you for the other
day...
(Um... Who was that again...?)

Word of Alexia's presence spreads in the blink of an
eye, and a constant stream of aristocrats flock
to greet her.

Why, if it isn't Princess Alexia! Our stores are
thriving thanks to your continued patronage.
We hope you will continue supporting us...
Y-Yes. I'm very happy with your products...

(This is all starting to get a bit tiring... Time to
rest somewhere out of the way...)
I-If you'll excuse me for a moment.

Ah, of course. Please allow me to introduce our
latest products to you when you return!
Yes...gladly...

Seriously! Why are so many people coming up to greet
me?! That was the 20th person just now!

I honestly don't recall half of their faces... I meet
so many people on official business that I can't keep
track of all of them.

I planned on making short work of all the greetings
so that I could enjoy my first time in a casino, but
it doesn't look like that's happening...

*sigh* If only there were some way to walk around
freely without being recognized.
Welcome to our casino! Have a welcome drink!

On your left are the card tables! And on your right
are the roulette tables!

That voice... I wonder if it's a bunny girl. Come to
think of it, I've never seen one before coming here.

Strange how it's a costume you don't see anywhere
else, but it's like a uniform here in the casino.

It must be hard to tell who you are when you're
wearing such a flashy costume.
Hard to tell who you are...
Th-That's it!
Here it is... The staff room.

If they can't tell I'm Alexia, I can walk around the
casino without standing out!

But I guess wearing the casino uniform is taking
things too far... No. You know what? I'll do it.
I've come this far.

Sorry, staff folk. I'll only borrow it for a short
time...a really short time. I promise to return it
after I've had my fun in the casino.

Bunny costume, bunny costume... Here! I'll just put
this on, and... Oh, let's go with this cuter one.

Yeah! It fits perfectly! Lucky me! It's surprisingly
comfortable.

This is the perfect disguise! No one will expect a
bunny girl to be a princess!

Whoa... Look at all those game tables I was too far
to see earlier! Those are the card tables...and the
roulette tables are over there!

Combined with the sense of openness, it's all so much
fun to take in!

Oh, they seem to be buzzing with excitement at that
table there. What is going on...?

A pile of chips appears in front of a player who just
won big.
...What?!

(D-Did that one chip just become 100 chips?! Is it
actually possible to win a haul like that in an
instant?!)

(Not that I'm interested in the money, but it must
feel great to win that much.)
(I wanna gamble as well and win big!)

Alexia's excitement increases as she heads for the
game table in front of her.
I'd like to join, if you don't mind.
...Huh?

Oh, my chips? Or the rules...? I was hoping you could
explain them to me along the way...
No, that's not what I mean...
Should you be slacking off work?
...Who, me?

Y-Yes. I don't think I've ever heard of a bunny girl
gambling during work...
Oh, right...
"Oh, right"? You're an odd one, aren't you?

C'mon, back to work. It looks like they need someone
at the next table over.
Fine, got it...

(Come to think of it... Even if I have more freedom
in this costume, I won't be able to gamble in it...)
N-No way! Lemme do it again!
Eek! Wh-What theâ€”?!
Sir, you're inconveniencing the other customers...

Gimme back the money I gambled! I'll settle for just
half! It's all I've got!
Wow...

Hey! I'm a customer! You can't treat me like this!
Lemme go, or elseâ€”
Agh?! Aahh...

The safety of our guests is our priority, so we have
rendered him unconscious. We sincerely apologize for
any discomfort this has caused you.

We hope you continue to enjoy your time at our
tables.

I see. Of course, it's only natural some win big
while others lose big.

It serves them right, but I shudder to think of such
a financial fallout...

(I think I understand a little better now why my
father and sister insisted I wasn't ready yet.)
That's the kind of world this is, Princess.

Huh?! Who're you calling "Princess"?!
...Wait, you're Natsuâ€”
Continue to Event Story 2...
